change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In addition to the information required by section 19 of the Act, a proponent must provide his or her mailing address and telephone number in the application for the issuance of a recall petition.

change.changenote: Section 5 (2) (c) (ii) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: that the person will have been resident in British Columbia for at least 6 months before the date on which he or she intends to begin canvassing, and
